articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Song Tao
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Song Tao
Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by a special envoy of the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.
					 The gift was conveyed to Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, by Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., CPC who is a special envoy of Xi Jinping, general secretary of the C.C., CPC, on Friday.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Meets with Song Tao
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Meets with Song Tao
Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, met and had a talk with Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China who is a special envoy of Xi Jinping, general secretary of the C.C., CPC, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.
					 Song Tao informed in detail of the 19th National Congress of the CPC.
					
					 He stressed the CPC's stand to steadily develop the traditional friendly relations between the two parties and countries.

articles.title: Talks Held between Ri Su Yong and Special Envoy of Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Talks Held between Ri Su Yong and Special Envoy of Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- There were talks between Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, and Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, who is visiting the DPRK as a special envoy of Xi Jinping, general secretary of the C.C., CPC, in Pyongyang on Saturday.
					 The two sides exchanged their views on such matters of mutual concern as the situation of the Korean peninsula and region and bilateral relations.
					
					 Present there from the DPRK side were Ri Chang Gun, vice department director of the C.C., WPK, and officials concerned, and from the Chinese side were the special envoy's party and Ri Jinjun, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Special Envoy of Xi Jinping Here
articles.content:
Special Envoy of Xi Jinping Here
Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, and his party arrived here on Friday as a special envoy of Xi Jinping, general secretary of the C.C., CPC.

articles.title: SPA Delegation Leaves for Turkey
articles.content:
SPA Delegation Leaves for Turkey
Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Supreme People's Assembly led by Deputy Ri Jong Hyok, director of the National Reunification Institute, left here Saturday to take part in the 10th Plenary Session of the Asian Parliamentary Assembly to be held in Turkey.

articles.title: Japanese Buddhist Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Japanese Buddhist Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- A Japanese Buddhist delegation led by Raitei Arima, director general of the Kyoto Buddhist Society of Japan, left here for home on Saturday.

articles.title: 3rd National Conference of Social Scientists Held
articles.content:
3rd National Conference of Social Scientists Held
Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- The Third National Conference of Social Scientists took place at the April 25 House of Culture here on Friday and Saturday.
					 The conference reviewed the successes and experiences gained in the field of social science after the last conference and discussed the tasks and ways to make a fresh turn in the development of the social sciences, as required by the developing revolution.
					
					 Present there were Vice-Chairmen of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Pak Kwang Ho and Pak Thae Song, Vice-Premier Jon Kwang Ho, officials concerned, researchers, teachers and editors in the fields of science, education and media and party cadres training organs, and in the sectors of revolutionary history and national relics preservation.
					
					 A delegation of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, followers of the Juche idea from various countries and other foreign guests were invited to the conference.
					
					 "Our Social Sciences Should Actively Contribute to Accomplishing the Cause of Modeling Whole Society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism", a letter sent by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un on Dec. 1, Juche 101 (2012) to the scientists and officials of the Academy of Social Science marking its 60th founding anniversary, was read out by Pak Kwang Ho, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK.
					
					 Congratulatory messages from the Central Standing Council of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan and the International Institute of the Juche Idea were also read out at the conference.
					
					 Pak Thae Song made a report.
					
					 He referred to the proud development path taken by the Juche-based social science along with the successful advance of the Korean revolution under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Terming the founding of the Juche idea by the President a noteworthy event that brought about a revolution in the history of human thought and the development of social sciences, he said:
					
					 The founding of the Juche idea provided ideo-theoretical and methodological guidelines for building the revolutionary social science in the new era of independence.
					
					 The President energetically guided the work in the field of social science for a long time in the period of building a new country after the liberation, during the Fatherland Liberation War and in the periods of post-war rehabilitation and reconstruction and construction of the foundation of socialism, thus bringing about valuable traditions of the Juche-based social science.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il set it as the primary task of social science to comprehensively systemize the revolutionary history and exploits of the President and give wide publicity to them at home and abroad and authored many works including "On the Juche Idea" and thus illuminated the road to be followed by social science for its successful development with the Juche idea as its guidelines.
					
					 Social science of the DPRK has been put on a fresh high level in its development, thanks to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 At a watershed of history when a new century of Juche began the Supreme Leader formulated the social science into the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist social science and is wisely guiding its work so that a revolutionary turn has been brought out in its development as required by the on-going drive for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The reporter noted that social scientists have made valuable successes conducive to prosperity of the country and development of the country's social science during the past years.
					
					 Speeches were made.
					
					 The speakers pledged to tangibly contribute to hastening the victory of the cause of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism by successfully settling the theoretical and practical issues arising in the building of a powerful socialist nation.

articles.title: Social Scientists Society of Korea Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Social Scientists Society of Korea Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- The Social Scientists Society of Korea on Saturday gave a reception at Okryu Restaurant in honor of foreign guests including Juche idea followers and overseas Korean scholars, who are participating in the 3rd National Conference of Social Scientists.
					 Present there on invitation were Harish Gupta, vice director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and his party, delegations and delegates of Juche idea study organizations, scholars from various Chinese social science institutions and universities, and a delegation of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan led by Chairman Ri Yong Su.
					
					 Pak Thae Song, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University and concurrently minister of Higher Education who is chairman of the Social Scientists Society of Korea, Ri Hye Jong, president of the Academy of Social Sciences, and officials concerned were on hand.

articles.title: Int'l Symposium on Koreanologies Held
articles.content:
Int'l Symposium on Koreanologies Held
Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- An international symposium on the Koreanologies took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Saturday.
					 Present there were teachers and researchers of Kim Il Sung University and Juche idea followers of different countries and other foreign guests and the delegation of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan who took part in the Third National Conference of Social Scientists.
					
					 The addressor of the symposium expressed belief that the international symposium, held during the Third National Conference of Social Scientists, would be helpful to deepening the study of the Koreanologies and having better understanding of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 Speeches were made on such subjects as "On Invincibility of Juche Socialism", "Universal Significance of Socialism Based on Juche Idea" and "Strategic Position of the DPRK Guaranteed by Powerful Politico-Military Might".
					
					 Speakers said that the Juche idea is a unique revolutionary idea showing the road ahead of mankind and socialist Korea plays the leading role in establishing a fair and just, new international order as the fortress for independence against imperialism.
					
					 They mentioned the strategic position of Juche Korea which proudly ranked itself among world-class nuclear powers and military powers by dint of self-reliance and self-development and the indomitable spirit of the Korean people advancing toward the high eminence of an economic power and a highly-civilized nation. And they explained scientific accuracy and superiority of the Korean style socialism.
					
					 They expressed belief that the DPRK, guided by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, would vigorously advance along the road of independence and justice, weathering the tempest of history.
					
					 The symposium heard the achievements and experience gained in the study of Koreanologies such as the Korean nation's time-honored history, peculiar folk traditions and manners and customs.

articles.title: April 25 Sports Team Attaining Dominance in Swimming
articles.content:
April 25 Sports Team Attaining Dominance in Swimming
Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- The April 25 Sports Team proved successful in the swimming events of the DPRK Championships closed some days ago.
					 It won 29 gold medals out of 42, showing its preponderance over other teams.
					
					 In particular, a female swimmer of the team was awarded 10 medals for new national records.
					
					 Meanwhile, the other 13 gold medals went to the Sports Team of the Ministry of Fisheries, the Ryongnamsan Sports Team and the Wolbongsan Sports Team.

articles.title: Drive for Using Natural Energy Brisk in Samjiyon County
articles.content:
Drive for Using Natural Energy Brisk in Samjiyon County
Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- It is being pushed forward in Samjiyon County, Ryanggang Province, the DPRK to harness natural energy, as part of the efforts to spruce up the county.
					 According to an official concerned, the electric power regiment of the 216 Division set up wind-power generators on the top of Pegae Hill in a short span of time, despite of unfavorable weather condition.
					
					 The regiment also finished the installation of a converter for 100kW solar power supply system and laying communication cable.

articles.title: U.S. Should Heed Lesson of History: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Should Heed Lesson of History: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- Recently the U.S. Defense Department issued a report on some possibility that it can commit its land force to the DPRK, drawing the attention of the public opinion.
					 The U.S. newspaper Washington Post on Nov. 4 reported that the U.S. Defense Department had drawn up the report saying that the key to detecting and removing the DPRK's tunnels keeping nukes is to introduce the U.S. ground force and sent it to the Congress.
					
					 This precisely means the replica of the Korean War in the 1950s, becoming the focus of attention of world media.
					
					 In the wake of the disclosure of the above-said report, the U.S. conducted a madcap high-intensity joint military drill with Japan and south Korean forces by sending three nuclear carrier strike groups towards the East Sea of Korea, and thus public fear has mushroomed.
					
					 Foreign sources pointed out its danger of the muscle flexing, commenting that "another maritime military drill to be conducted by the U.S. forces in the Pacific is tantamount to the declaration of a war against north Korea" and "the appearance of 3 carrier flotillas shows that the U.S. navy is getting ready for going into action."
					
					 As is generally known, the U.S. dangerous saber-rattling aimed at triggering a nuclear war without fail in the region has reached the extremes.
					
					 However, the U.S. attempt to stifle the DPRK by force of arms is nothing but a daydream of the fools who failed to learn from the lesson of history.
					
					 The history of centuries-long standoff between the DPRK and U.S. clearly proves no one can underestimate or test its rival.
					
					 The U.S. should not forget that numerous remains of the U.S. troops who had died in the past Korean War still remain buried in Korea, far from considering "introduction of ground force".
					
					 It had better recall the U.S. armed spy ship Pueblo anchored in the River Pothong and the ill-fated large-sized spy plane "EC-121" rather than stage "muscle flexing" by mobilizing all sorts of nuclear strategic assets.
					
					 What's more, the U.S. should not forget that these victories were won by the DPRK, a former non-nuclear state, in the showdown with the U.S., the world's biggest nuclear power.
					
					 Gone are the days never to return when the U.S. could browbeat the DPRK with its nukes.
					
					 Whenever the U.S. goes reckless, oblivious of the lesson of history of DPRK-U.S standoff, it will only precipitate the miserable end of the "only superpower".
					
					 The DPRK remains strong-willed and is sure to win the final victory in the showdown with the U.S., the empire of evil.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on S. Korean Regime's "New Southern Policy"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on S. Korean Regime's "New Southern Policy"
Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- The chief executive of south Korea advertised about what is called "new southern policy" and asked for affirmative cooperation in it during his recent tour of Southeast Asian countries.
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says:
					
					 Such behavior was prompted by his sinister and crafty scheme to inveigle Southeast Asian nations into the anti-DPRK sanctions and pressure campaign.
					
					 The "new southern policy" is no more than a last resort of the south Korean puppet authorities to get rid of diplomatic isolation and crisis caused by their own traitorous policies as they are hell-bent on sycophancy and treachery with dependence on the U.S., Japan and other neighboring powers.
					
					 The south Korean regime is a servant faithful to the U.S. strategy and war policy for domination over Asia. It is brazen for such servant to tout "new southern policy and advocate the regional peace and cooperation.
					
					 If the puppet authorities continue to escalate distrust and confrontation between the north and the south with such sinister policy, they should be entirely blamed for the consequences arising therefrom.

articles.title: Rodong Simun Slams Japan's Fabrication of "Ulsa Five-point Treaty"
articles.content:
Rodong Simun Slams Japan's Fabrication of "Ulsa Five-point Treaty"
Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday carries an article on the lapse of 112 years since the Japanese imperialists fabricated the illegal "Ulsa (1905) Five-point Treaty" against the Korean people.
					 Citing facts to prove that the "treaty" which left incurable wounds in the minds of the Korean people was just an illegal document devoid of validity as it was fabricated by the Japanese imperialists through military threats and blackmails, the article says:
					
					 There are no such imperialists as the Japanese imperialists who made no scruple of depriving a country of its sovereignty and flouting the destiny of a nation with such a nameless "treaty".
					
					 The crime the Japanese imperialists committed by fabricating the "treaty" in a brigandish manner can never be written off.
					
					 But Japan has neither admitted the past crimes committed in Korea nor made any apology and reparation for them, insisting that its colonial rule over Korea was "legally just."
					
					 Worse still, it is watching a chance for launching reinvasion of Korea with the backing of the U.S., dancing to the tune of its American master's war drumbeats, out of its wild ambition for reinvasion.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have added to the crimes by playing the role of running dogs of the U.S. for igniting a war against the DPRK century after century.
					
					 The Korean people will never fail to make them pay dearly for their past and present crimes.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Regime's Anti-DPRK Moves Are Bound to Go Bankrupt: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Regime's Anti-DPRK Moves Are Bound to Go Bankrupt: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- Trump, during his recent trip to some Asian countries, urged them to fully implement the UN "sanctions resolutions", break off or downgrade their diplomatic relations with the DPRK and stop all trade and technological exchange with it. He said the U.S. is "ready to use military force if necessary", terming the DPRK's nuclear deterrent for self-defence a "threat."
					 In this regard, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article:
					
					 The crazy moves of the U.S. to stifle the DPRK are just a robber-like act to stamp out the DPRK's sovereignty and rights to existence and development.
					
					 However, the present ruling quarters of south Korea are adding fuel to the already tense situation on the Korean peninsula by getting hell-bent on the moves to stifle the DPRK in league with the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet regime of south Korea are so foolish as to calculate that the DPRK would step back from the road chosen by itself if they ratchet up sanctions and pressure on it.
					
					 The DPRK has creditably protected its ideology and social system from the aggressive challenges by the U.S. and its vassal forces for decades. It has dynamically advanced along the only road of Juche-based socialism without any slightest hesitation or vacillation.
					
					 As the DPRK's victory is a science, it is an inevitability of history that the U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK are bound to go belly-up.
					
					 The DPRK is taking the road of triumph and the time and justice are on its side.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by Brazilian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by Brazilian Organization
Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea on Nov. 10 posted on its website the full text of President Kim Il Sung's work "The Tasks of Korean Communists" on the occasion of the 80th anniversary of its publication.
					 The work, published on Nov. 10, Juche 26 (1937), defines the character of the then Korean revolution as anti-imperialist, anti-feudal democratic and indicates the tasks and ways for the Korean communists to further intensify the anti-Japanese armed struggle and boost solidarity with the international revolutionary force.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Iran
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Iran
Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- A committee of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed on Nov. 11.
					 A vice-general secretary of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee set a remembrance period from Nov. 11 to Dec. 20 and decided to hold political and cultural events praising the career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the sixth anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Trump Blamed by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Trump Blamed by Swiss Organizations
Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on Nov. 11 issued a joint statement in denunciation of the U.S. president's tour of Asia.
					 The statement branded Trump's first junket to Asia after taking office as one of the war merchant for filling the purse of the U.S. munitions monopolies with money from its "junior allies".
					
					 It also charged that during his junket he begged for a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula and tried to separate the government of the DPRK from its people, adding that his attempts will get him nowhere.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de enviado especial de Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de enviado especial de Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, 18 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio el regalo que le obsequiara el enviado especial del Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China, de visita en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Song Tao, enviado especial de Xi Jinping, Secretario General del CC del PCCh, y jefe del departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh, lo traslado el dia 17 a Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae se reune con enviado especial de Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae se reune con enviado especial de Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, 18 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y del CC del PTC, se reunio el dia 17 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con Song Tao, enviado especial de Xi Jinping, Secretario General del CC del Partido Comunista de China, y jefe del departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh.
					El visitante chino informo detalladamente el estado de la realizacion del 19o Congreso del PCCh.
					
					Y se refirio a la posicion del partido chino de seguir desarrollando las tradicionales relaciones de amistad entre dos partidos y dos paises.

articles.title: Conversan en Pyongyang Ri Su Yong y el enviado especial de Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Conversan en Pyongyang Ri Su Yong y el enviado especial de Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, 18 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 18 en esta capital las conversaciones entre Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, y Song Tao, jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh, quien es el enviado especial de Xi Jinping, Secretario General del CC del Partido Comunista de China.
					En la ocasion, ambas partes intercambiaron las opiniones sobre los problemas de interes comun incluyendo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y la regional y las relaciones bilaterales.
					
					Estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Chang Gun, y otros funcionarios interesados y, por la china, los acompanantes del enviado especial y el embajador chino en Corea, Li Jinjun.

articles.title: Llegan a Pyongyang el enviado especial de Xi Jinping y su comitiva
articles.content:
Llegan a Pyongyang el enviado especial de Xi Jinping y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 18 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Llegaron el dia 17 a esta capital Song Tao, enviado especial de Xi Jinping, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China, y jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh, y su comitiva.

articles.title: Delegacion de APS parte de Pyongyang hacia Turquia
articles.content:
Delegacion de APS parte de Pyongyang hacia Turquia
Pyongyang, 18 de noviembre (ACNC) -- La delegacion de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, encabezada por Ri Jong Hyok, diputado a la APS y director del Instituto de la Reunificacion de la Patria (IRP), partio el dia 18 de esta capital para tomar parte en la X Asamblea Parlamentaria Asiatica que se efectuara en Turquia.

articles.title: Tiene lugar III Conferencia Nacional de Cientificos Sociales
articles.content:
Tiene lugar III Conferencia Nacional de Cientificos Sociales
Pyongyang, 18 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 17 y 18 en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril la III Conferencia Nacional de Cientificos Sociales.
					En la ocasion se hizo balance de los exitos y experiencias logrados en las ciencias sociales despues de la edicion anterior de la misma conferencia y se discutieron las tareas y remedios para producir nuevo cambio en el desarrollo de la rama conforme a la demanda de la revolucion en avance.
					
					Estuvieron presentes los vicepresidentes del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Pak Kwang Ho y Pak Thae Song, el vicepremier Jon Kwang Ho y otros funcionarios y los investigadores, profesores y redactores de los organismos de ciencia, educacion, prensa e informacion, formacion de cuadros del partido y del sector de preservacion de reliquias de interes historico-revolucionario y de patrimonios nacionales.
					
					Fueron invitados la delegacion de la Asociacion de Cientificos Sociales Coreanos en Japon, los adeptos a la idea Juche de varios paises del mundo y otros huespedes extranjeros.
					
					El miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del CC del PTC, Pak Kwang Ho, dio lectura al mensaje del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un "Nuestras ciencias sociales deben contribuir activamente al cumplimiento de la causa de transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo", enviado el primero de diciembre del 101 (2012) de la Era Juche a los cientificos y funcionarios de la Academia de Ciencias Sociales que acogian el aniversario 60 de la fundacion de esta entidad.
					
					Fueron leidos los mensajes de felicitacion enviados al conclave por el Consejo Permanente Central de la Asociacion de Cientificos Sociales Coreanos en Japon y el Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Pak Thae Song.
					
					Pak senalo que las ciencias sociales coreanas recorrieron el camino de desarrollo orgulloso, al igual que el avance victorioso de la revolucion coreana, bajo la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, y prosiguio:
					
					La creacion de la inmortal idea Juche por el Presidente fue el acontecimiento especial que produjo cambio revolucionario en la historia de concepcion de pensamientos de la humanidad y las ciencias sociales.
					
					Gracias al nacimiento de ese pensamiento, se preparo la guia ideo-teorica y metodologica para la construccion de ciencias sociales revolucionarias en la nueva epoca de independencia.
					
					Durante largo tiempo desde la construccion de nueva patria, la severa Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, la reconstruccion posbelica hasta la construccion de la base del socialismo, el Presidente dirigio energicamente las labores de esta rama preparando su tradicion valiosa.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il presento como deber principal de las ciencias sociales sistematizar globalmente la historia revolucionaria y hazanas del Presidente y propagarlas ampliamente en el interior y exterior del pais y publico numerosas obras incluyendo "Sobre la idea Juche".
					
					Asi ilumino la via de desarrollar globalmente las ciencias sociales tomando la idea Juche como guia directriz.
					
					Las ciencias sociales de Corea entraron en nueva etapa de su desarrollo bajo la guia del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					En el punto de viraje de la historia en que comienza nueva centuria del Juche, el Maximo Dirigente formulo las ciencias sociales como las Kimilsungistas-Kimjongilistas y conduce sabiamente a registrar cambio revolucionario en el desarrollo de ellas conforme a la demanda de transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo.
					
					Durante el tiempo pasado, los cientificos sociales lograron valiosos exitos de investigacion que contribuyen a la prosperidad de la patria y al desarrollo de ciencias sociales del pais.
					
					Acto seguido, hubo intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores expusieron la decision de resolver exitosamente los problemas teorico-practicos surgidos en la construccion de potencia socialista para hacer gran aporte al cumplimiento adelantado de la causa de identificacion de toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo.

articles.title: Tiene lugar el simposio internacional sobre coreanologia
articles.content:
Tiene lugar el simposio internacional sobre coreanologia
Pyongyang, 18 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 18 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el simposio academico internacional sobre la coreanologia.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los profesores e investigadores de la Academia de Ciencias Sociales y la Universidad Kim Il Sung, los adeptos a la idea Juche de varios paises que participan en la III Conferencia Nacional de Cientificos Sociales y otros huespedes extranjeros asi como la delegacion de la Asociacion de Cientificos Sociales Coreanos en Japon.
					
					Hubo discursos.
					
					El orador expreso la conviccion de que el simposio internacional, que se abre durante la III Conferencia Nacional de Cientificos Sociales, permitira profundizar el estudio y el entendimiento de la coreanologia.
					
					Hubo intervenciones con temas "Sobre el caracter invencible del socialismo del Juche", "Importancia general del socialismo basado en la idea Juche", "Posicion estrategica de la RPDC garantizada con grandes fuerzas politicas y militares" y otros.
					
					Los seminaristas senalaron que la idea Juche es el original pensamiento revolucionario que aclaro el camino a seguir por la humanidad y subrayaron que como fortaleza de independencia antiimperialista, la Corea socialista desempena el papel conductor en establecer un nuevo orden internacional de caracter imparcial y justo.
					
					Se refirieron a la posicion estrategica de la Corea del Juche, que entro dignamente en la primera fila de potencias nucleares y militares del mundo con el poderio de autofortalecimiento, y al espiritu indoblegable del pueblo coreano que avanza hacia la meta de potencia economica y civilizada.
					
					Explicaron y argumentaron el caracter cientifico y las ventajas del socialismo al estilo coreano.
					
					Afirmaron que bajo la orientacion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, la RPDC avanzara por la senda de independencia y justicia frustrando todas las pruebas de la historia.
					
					En el foro fueron presentados los exitos y experiencias logrados en la larga historia, la tradicion folclorica, costumbres de vida de la nacion coreana y en el estudio de la coreanologia.

articles.title: Conjunto Deportivo 25 de Abril se distingue en natacion
articles.content:
Conjunto Deportivo 25 de Abril se distingue en natacion
Pyongyang, 18 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Los nadadores del Conjunto Deportivo 25 de Abril obtuvieron buenos resultados en la natacion del reciente Campeonato Nacional.
					En esta cita deportiva ellos conquistaron 29 de 42 medallas de oro (15 para hombre y 14 para mujer).
					
					En particular, una nadadora del Conjunto gano 10 medallas de nuevo record nacional sorprendiendo a los especialistas y los aficionados.
					
					En el campeonato, los nadadores del Conjunto Deportivo del Ministerio de Industria Pesquera, el Ryongnamsan y otro Wolbongsan sobresalieron en el crol (m) de 50m y 800m, la mariposa (m) de 50m, 100m y 200m, el crol (f) de 200m, la braza (f) de 50m, la espalda (f) de 50m, 100m y 200m, la natacion mixta individual de 400m y la natacion mixta de relevos de ambos sexos de 4×100m.
